message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $800000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $600000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to negotiate. I can offer you the product for $700000. It's a fair price considering its value, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this unique item. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $700000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $650000. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $650000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I can offer you the product for $675000. It's a fair price considering its value, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this unique item. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $675000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go a bit higher, but I'll offer $660000. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $660000 is still a bit low for me, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer you the product for $680000. It's a fair price considering its value, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this unique item. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I still think $680000 is a bit high. I'll meet you in the middle again and offer $670000. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $670000 is still a bit low for me, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you the product for $690000. It's a fair price considering its value, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this unique item. What do you think?

I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at $680000. I think that's a fair price considering the value you're placing on it. If you're willing to accept, I'm ready to make a deal.
